actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize a dam and reservoir for  flood control and other purposes on the Pembina River, near Walhalia, North Dakota.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to construct the Pembina River dam and reservoir project in North Dakota, at an estimated initial cost of $24,900,000.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a dam and reservoir for  flood control and other purposes on the Pembina River, near Walhalia, North Dakota.
